DOC.brief_summary: This prospective non-interventional 24 month post implant registry . Any patient receives St. Jude Medical FDA approve implantable neuromodulation system eligible enrollment . A minimum 600 patient enrol minimum 30 site . Patients enrol post-implant follow 24 month . Data collect enrollment ( within 30 day device implant ) , routine care follow-up visit 3 month , 6 month , 12 month , 18 month 24 month .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient sign receive copy Informed Consent form ; 2 . Patient implanted St. Jude Medical Neuromodulation system , include battery and/or SCS lead ; 3 . Patient 18 year age old . 4 . Patient currently participate another clinical trial .
